meanings.meaning: 1. good; advantage; benefit; welfare Usually written using kana alone, See also 為にあなたのためなら喜んでどんなことでもします。I am ready to do anything for you.
2. sake; purpose; objective; aim Usually written using kana alone１月３０日、３１日は葬式のため休みます。I'm taking bereavement leave on Jan. 30 and 31.
3. consequence; result; effect Usually written using kana aloneそれは、おまえの声をよく聞くためだよ。It is in order to hear your voice well.
4. affecting; regarding; concerning Usually written using kana alone
爲 【ため】、為め 【ため】
爲: Out-dated kanji or kanji usage. 為め: Irregular okurigana usage.

meanings.type: Su verb - precursor to the modern suru

sentences.translation: I am ready to do anything for you.
I'm taking bereavement leave on Jan. 30 and 31.
It is in order to hear your voice well.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to become; to get; to grow; to turn; to reach; to attain Usually written using kana aloneあなたがいなくなるととても寂しくなります。When you go, I'll miss you very much.

meanings.meaning: 2. to result in; to turn out; to end up; to prove (to be) Usually written using kana alone１週間してそのニュースは本当になった。The news turned out true in a week.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to consist of; to be composed of; to be made up of Usually written using kana alone, as ...からなる or ...よりなる１チームは９人の選手から成る。Nine players make up a team.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to build up; to establish Usually written using kana alone, esp. 成す彼は作家として名を成そうという野心を持っている。He has an ambition to make a name for himself as a writer.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to form; to become (a state) Usually written using kana alone, esp. 成すイナゴが大群をなしてやってきた。Locusts came in big swarms.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to accomplish; to achieve; to succeed in Usually written using kana alone人間は動物よりはるかに多くの偉業をなしてきたのである。Human beings have achieved a lot more than animals.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to change into Usually written using kana aloneあなたのいうことと成すことは違う。You don't practice what you preach.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to do; to perform Usually written using kana alone, esp. 為す
6. to intend to; to attempt; to try Archaic
成す 【なす】

sentences.translation: He has an ambition to make a name for himself as a writer.
Locusts came in big swarms.
Human beings have achieved a lot more than animals.
You don't practice what you preach.

meanings.meaning: 1. to do; to carry out; to perform Usually written using kana alone「これ以上何も言うことはありません、いいわけをするのはいやですから」と彼は言った。He said, "I will say nothing more, because I hate making excuses."
2. to cause to become; to make (into); to turn (into) Usually written using kana aloneそれらはあなたを暖かくするのに役立つでしょう。They will help you to get warm.
3. to serve as; to act as; to work as Usually written using kana alone頭痛を言い訳にして、彼は早く帰った。He used a headache as an excuse for leaving early.
4. to wear (clothes, a facial expression, etc.) Usually written using kana aloneそんな苦虫を噛みつぶしたような顔するなよ。Don't make such a sour face.
5. to judge as being; to view as being; to think of as; to treat as; to use as Usually written using kana alone, as 〜にする,〜とする
6. to decide on; to choose Usually written using kana alone, as 〜にする結構です。それにしましょう。All right. I'll take it.
7. to be sensed (of a smell, noise, etc.) Usually written using kana alone, as 〜がするこのスープはいやなにおいがする。腐っているでしょう？This soup smells horrible. Do you think it's gone off?
8. to be (in a state, condition, etc.) Usually written using kana alone
9. to be worth; to cost Usually written using kana alone
10. to pass (of time); to elapse Usually written using kana alone彼は三日したら出発する。He is leaving in three days.
11. to place, or raise, person A to a post or status B Usually written using kana alone, as AをBにする
12. to transform A to B; to make A into B; to exchange A for B Usually written using kana alone, as AをBにする
13. to make use of A for B; to view A as B; to handle A as if it were B Usually written using kana alone, as AをBにする
14. to feel A about B Usually written using kana alone, as AをBにする
15. verbalizing suffix (applies to nouns noted in this dictionary with the part of speech "vs") Usually written using kana alone
16. creates a humble verb (after a noun prefixed with "o" or "go") Usually written using kana alone, See also お願いします, See also 御
17. to be just about to; to be just starting to; to try to; to attempt to Usually written using kana alone, See also とする, as 〜うとする,〜ようとする
為る: Rarely-used kanji form.
1. to do; to carry out; to perform Usually written using kana alone「これ以上何も言うことはありません、いいわけをするのはいやですから」と彼は言った。He said, "I will say nothing more, because I hate making excuses."
2. to cause to become; to make (into); to turn (into) Usually written using kana aloneそれらはあなたを暖かくするのに役立つでしょう。They will help you to get warm.
3. to serve as; to act as; to work as Usually written using kana alone頭痛を言い訳にして、彼は早く帰った。He used a headache as an excuse for leaving early.
4. to wear (clothes, a facial expression, etc.) Usually written using kana aloneそんな苦虫を噛みつぶしたような顔するなよ。Don't make such a sour face.
5. to judge as being; to view as being; to think of as; to treat as; to use as Usually written using kana alone, as 〜にする,〜とする
6. to decide on; to choose Usually written using kana alone, as 〜にする結構です。それにしましょう。All right. I'll take it.
7. to be sensed (of a smell, noise, etc.) Usually written using kana alone, as 〜がするこのスープはいやなにおいがする。腐っているでしょう？This soup smells horrible. Do you think it's gone off?
8. to be (in a state, condition, etc.) Usually written using kana alone
9. to be worth; to cost Usually written using kana alone
10. to pass (of time); to elapse Usually written using kana alone彼は三日したら出発する。He is leaving in three days.
11. to place, or raise, person A to a post or status B Usually written using kana alone, as AをBにする
12. to transform A to B; to make A into B; to exchange A for B Usually written using kana alone, as AをBにする
13. to make use of A for B; to view A as B; to handle A as if it were B Usually written using kana alone, as AをBにする
14. to feel A about B Usually written using kana alone, as AをBにする
15. verbalizing suffix (applies to nouns noted in this dictionary with the part of speech "vs") Usually written using kana alone
16. creates a humble verb (after a noun prefixed with "o" or "go") Usually written using kana alone, See also お願いします, See also 御
17. to be just about to; to be just starting to; to try to; to attempt to Usually written using kana alone, See also とする, as 〜うとする,〜ようとする
為る: Rarely-used kanji form.

sentences.translation: He said, "I will say nothing more, because I hate making excuses."
They will help you to get warm.
He used a headache as an excuse for leaving early.

All right. I'll take it.
